resources.string:
"Google Developer Group New Delhi provides a network for people who " "are interested in Google's open source technologies and also love the spirit of sharing in" "the field of technology.

"
"A place for developers to express their enthusiasm, questions or concerns, ideas and " "opinions.

"
"Various Google Developer Technologies like Googleâ€™s Android Mobile Operating System, App " "Engine, Google Web Toolkit apart from several Google APIs Like Earth API, YouTube API, " "Maps API are discussed.

"
"We Are Inclusive, Not Exclusive.

 Events organized are:
" "- Hackathons
" "- Code Labs
" "- DevFests
" "- GCP Next Extended
" "- I/O Extended
" "- Study Jams
" "- Talks
" "- Design Sprints
" "- Un-Conference
"
